item.name: mdt_jobstats
ost_jobstats
ost_ldlm_stats
item.pattern: snapshot_time +([[:digit:]]+).+ granted +[[:digit:]]+ samples \[locks\] +([[:digit:]]+).+ grant +[[:digit:]]+ samples \[locks\] +([[:digit:]]+).+ cancel +[[:digit:]]+ samples \[locks\] +([[:digit:]]+).+ grant_rate +[[:digit:]]+ samples \[locks\/s\] +([[:digit:]]+).+ cancel_rate +[[:digit:]]+ samples \[locks\/s\] +([[:digit:]]+).+ grant_plan +[[:digit:]]+ samples \[locks\/s\] +([[:digit:]]+).+ slv +[[:digit:]]+ samples \[slv\] +([[:digit:]]+).+ recalc_freed +[[:digit:]]+ samples \[locks\] +([[:digit:]]+).+ recalc_timing +[[:digit:]]+ samples \[sec\] +([[:digit:]]+).+
